summary: A newlywed man on his honeymoon has second thoughts about his marriage and falls for a different woman.
cast: Charles Grodin|Cybill Shepherd|Jeannie Berlin|Audra Lindley|Eddie Albert|Mitchell Jason|William Prince|Augusta Dabney|Doris Roberts|Marilyn Putnam|Jack Hausman|Erik Lee Preminger|Art Metrano|Tim Browne|Jean Scoppa|Gregory Scherick|Marianne Muellerleile|Neil Simon|Joel Thingvall|Jim Westcott
title: El rompecorazones
